title.value: Влияние внекорневых подкормок регулятором роста Экосил-Форте на устойчивость к пероноспорозу и продуктивность огурца открытого грунта
Effect of foliar fertilizing with a growth regulator Ekosil-Forte on downy mildew resistance and productivity of open ground cucumber

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Nalobova, V.L., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of tests of growth regulator Ecosil-Forte for foliar fertilizing plants in the cultivation of cucumber (Cucumis sativus) in the open field. It is established that foliar crop growth regulator Ecosil-Forte has improved the yield of cucumber by 12.9% compared with the control and receipt of the additional products worth 16.7 million Br. rubles / ha. It is noted that the use of Ecosil-Forte for foliar fertilizing plantations cucumber had an impact on reducing the incidence of plant peronosporosis. The prevalence of the disease in this was 21%, lower than the control at 7.2%. It was found that in case of foliar treatment of cucumber plants with the growth regulator Ecosil-Forte the shoots length in the hybrid F1 Vyaselka increased by 8.6%, the number of shoots by 14% and the number of flowers by 17% in comparison with the control variant (without treatment).
